mapper.select: select roles.id, roles.name, roles.code, code.name as codeName, roles.type, type.name as typeName from sys_users sys_user join sys_user_in_role uir on sys_user.id = uir.user_id and uir.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.id = #{userId} join sys_roles roles on uir.role_id = roles.id and roles.is_deleted = 0 and roles.is_locked = 0 left join sys_code code on roles.code = code.value and code.is_deleted = 0 left join sys_code type on roles.type = type.value and type.is_deleted = 0

select organization.id, organization.code, code.name as codeName, organization.parent_id, organization.parent_code, parent_code.name as parentCodeName, organization.name from sys_users sys_user join sys_user_in_organization uio on sys_user.id = uio.user_id and uio.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.id = #{userId} join sys_organizations organization on uio.organization_id = organization.id and organization.is_deleted = 0 and organization.is_locked = 0 left join sys_code code on organization.code = code.value and code.is_deleted = 0 left join sys_code parent_code on organization.parent_code = parent_code.value and parent_code.is_deleted = 0 order by organization.sequence
